p: Reports of Psidium myrtoides and P. salutare have focused on the effects of seasonality in the essential oils’ chemical composition. Both species were registered to the Chapada do Araripe, Ceará state, Brazil, with their leaves sampled in February, May, August, and November, which encompasses the dry and rainy seasons of that region [ 25, 93]. The variation in the leaf essential oils is illustrated in Figure 5.
